item.title: A new skin for tribal.be
item.dc:creator: Xavier Damman
item.content:encoded: Need your help one more time guys; TRIBAL.be is getting old. Almost 5 years that the site holds the same blue skin. I recently removed the full width style and added some ajax features (the thumbs up, thumbs down), but it definitely needs much more. Sebastien (from dynasite.be) is working on. Here is the mockup he made. What do you think about? (full image here)
